                   java.lang.String sender,

        Parameters:
        data - Data to be encrypted.
        sender - User sending the message being encrypted.
        recipient - User receiving the message being encrypted.

      • decryptStream

        void decryptStream(java.io.InputStream in,
                   java.io.OutputStream out,
                   java.lang.String sender,
                   java.lang.String recipient,
                   long inSize,
                   long outSize)
            throws CryptoException
        Parameters:
        in - Data that was encrypted.
        out - The decrypted data.
        sender - User sending the message being encrypted.
        recipient - User receiving the message being encrypted.
        inSize - size of the encrypted 'in' stream, in bytes.
        outSize - the original file size, in bytes. -1 if unknown.
        Throws:
        CryptoException
